com.clover.remote.client.device

Class WebSocketCloverDeviceConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clover.remote.client.device.WebSocketCloverDeviceConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CloverDeviceConfiguration, java.io.Serializable

    public class WebSocketCloverDeviceConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements CloverDeviceConfiguration, java.io.Serializable
    Default configuration to communicate with the Mini via WebSockets to the LAN Pay Display
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • WebSocketCloverDeviceConfiguration

        public WebSocketCloverDeviceConfiguration(java.net.URI endpoint,
                                          java.lang.String applicationId,
                                          java.security.KeyStore trustStore,
                                          java.lang.String posName,
                                          java.lang.String serialNumber,
                                          PairingDeviceConfiguration pairingConfig,
                                          java.lang.String authToken)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        endpoint - network endpoint of the device to connect to
        applicationId - remote application ID
        trustStore - certificate keystore used to support the secure websockets protocol (wss)
        posName - point of sale name
        serialNumber - serial number of the POS terminal/device attaching to the clover device
        pairingConfig - callback to handle pairing notifications
        authToken - cached authentication token provided from a previous PairingDeviceConfiguration.onPairingSuccess(String) call

        public CloverTransport getCloverTransport()
        Description copied from interface: CloverDeviceConfiguration
